name: site
description: name of the site of the experiment

name: yield
description: dry-weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity
notes: if necessary computed from fresh weight. If necessary, assume standard moisture content. See Table 1

name: P_fertilizer
description: P fertilizer applied (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K fertilizer applied (as K, not K2O)
